availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George L. Torian (Trigg County, Kentucky, planter.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, planter. Halifax County, Virginia, native. Married to Harriet Burbridge Torian in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 12, 1826. Father of Lavinia Torian. Married to Elizabeth E. McCarty Weakley Torian in Christian County, Kentucky, on October 5, 1837. Father of Harriett Torian, Margaret Torian, and Thomas K. Torian. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Planter in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
